p: Lockdown and phase 2 terms are modeled with exponential functions (see Methods in Supplementary Information) that act as attenuation (lockdown) and amplification (phase 2) factors of the reproductive number R t, with, respectively, halving and doubling times (in units of 1Â day) that are free parameters of the model. The lockdown attenuation ends when phase 2 starts, and phase 2 amplification ends when R t reaches the original value R 0 characteristic of the disease.
